info.description:
inspired by reference:  https://twitter.com/pickover/status/1556458766194835456
mouse controls camera

could this generalize to more (long) branches ? :-)

renderpass.code:
// more readable version below  564

// -3 by Xor

#define rot(a)      mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))           // rotation 
#define C(q, r, l)  max(abs(q.y)-l,length(q.xz)-r)         // cylinder
#define B(q,T)      r= q, r.z = abs(r.z)-1., r.xy *= rot( sign(q.z)*(T)), t = min(t, C(r,.3,2.5))

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.;
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = vec3(U*.4 - R.xy*.2, -R.y) / R.y,            // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,0,20), q, r,                          // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R -.5
              :  vec3(.1,0,0) * cos(iTime + vec3(0,11,0)); 
    for (O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01)           // march scene
        q = p,
        q.yz *= rot(.78-6.*M.y),                           // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(.78-6.*M.x), 
        t = min( C(q.zxy,.1,1.5), C(q.xzy,.1,1.5) ),       // axis
        r = q, r.y+=2., t = min(t,C(r,.3,4.)),             // trunck
        B(q,iTime), B(q.zyx,iTime-1.6),                    // bars
     // B(q.zxy,iTime-.8),                                 // ( try adding horizontals :-) )
        p += .5*t*D;                                       // step forward = dist to obj          

   O *= O * 1.5;                                           // color scheme
}






/**  // --- 649 chars

#define rot(a)        mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,-1.57,1.57,0)))    // rotation 
#define C(q, r, l)    max(abs(q.y)-l,length(q.xz)-r)

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.;
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -5.*R.y) - R),           // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,0,20), q, r,                          // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R -.5
              :  vec3( .1,0,0) * cos(iTime + vec3(0,11,0)); 
    for (O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01)           // march scene
        q = p,
        q.yz *= rot(.78-6.*M.y),                           // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(.78-6.*M.x), 
        t = min( C(q.zxy,.1,1.5), C(q.xzy,.1,1.5) ),       // axis
        r = q, r.y+=2., t = min(t,C(r,.3,4.)),             // trunck
        r = q, r.z++, r.xy*=rot( iTime),     t = min(t, C(r,.3,2.)), // bars
        r = q, r.z--, r.xy*=rot(-iTime),     t = min(t, C(r,.3,2.)),
        r = q, r.x++, r.yz*=rot(-iTime-1.6), t = min(t, C(r,.3,2.)),
        r = q, r.x--, r.yz*=rot( iTime+1.6), t = min(t, C(r,.3,2.)),
        p += .5*t*D;                                       // step forward = dist to obj          

   O *= O * 1.5;                                           // color scheme
}
